titles.title: A Close Walk With God (easy nice)

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O for a closer walk with God A calm and heav'nly frame A light to shine upon the road That leads me to the Lamb{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Where is the blessedness I knew When first I saw the Lord Where is the soul-refreshing view Of Jesus and His word{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}What peaceful hours I once enjoyed How sweet their memory still But they have left an aching void The world can never fill{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Return O Holy Dove return Sweet messenger of rest I hate the sins that made Thee mourn And drove Thee from my breast{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The dearest idol I have known What e'er that idol be Help me to tear it from Thy throne And worship only Thee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}So shall my walk be close with God Calm and serene my frame So purer light shall mark the road That leads me to the Lamb{/lang-eng}
